snippet.title: Onward: Asylum (Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
Going onwards as we escape this horrific asylum— an indie horror sidescroller where your task is to get out of the facility without getting captured by the monster itself.

Onward: Asylum is a horror-themed side-scroller game that let the players assume the role of Grace, a child that is looking for her mother upon waking up in a post-apocalyptic hospital. Grace embarks on a small journey to look for her mother, but she must face certain challenges that will hinder the completion of her goal.

gamelink:
https://ppstudios.itch.io/onward-asylum



 #gametrailer #onwardasylum  #indiegame #horrorgame #ppstudios  #unity #gamedev
